An example of math within a paragraph --- \({e}^{i\pi }+1=0\) --- easy enough.

And an equation on it's own:

\[ {x}_{1,2}=\frac{-b\pm \sqrt{{b}^{2}-4ac}}{2a} \]

That's it.
